full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/25/2023 BARLOW SANATORIUM AND HOSPITAL Founded by W. Jarvis Barlow in 1902 2000 STADIUM WAY LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90026 TELEPHONE (213) 628-4165 January 27, 1969 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: Re: Mrs. Ko Wai Oi NG 341 Des Volux Road, West 3/F Hong Kong This is to certify that the Barlow Sanatorium and Hospital, located at 2000 Stadium Way, Los Angeles, California 90026, and endorsed by the United States Public Health Service as a recognized institution for the treatment of tuberculosis, agrees to accept the above-named individual for evaluation of a pulmonary lesion and for treatment of same, if active tuber- culosis is found. Satisfactory financial arrangements have been made by a responsible individual for the care of this alien. We will submit to the Chief of the Foreign Quarantine Program, National Communicable Disease Center, Atlanta, Georgia 30333, an initial report giving a clinical evaluation of the alien, including necessary x-ray films, within 30 days after the alien's arrival at the Barlow Sanatorium and Hospital; or if, within 30 days after receipt of notice from the United States Public Health Service, she has not reported to our hospital, a report stating this fact. We will also submit to the above NCDC a report of the final disposition of this case. Sincerely, Prockees MD John J. Procknow, M. D. Medical Director JJP: jb
